name: ReSail
description:
“Rewind the wind to manipulate the sail race, to ensure that order is kept.”

Take part in the sailboat race of the century, ReSail. Rewind the wind to manipulate the race and ensure order is kept as the leader board predicts. Use your wind powers to guide the boats in the right order to the goal!

The goal: Get all the boats to the finishing line in the correct order, using the wind and weather at your disposal.

  • Drag left mouse button & click - Control the wind
  • Mouse scroll wheel - Zoom
  • WASD - Move the camera

Made according to the theme "Rewind" for #BrackeysGameJam 2020.2

Team:

  • Snuti - Christer Eckermann (Code,  3D Art)
  • Snuti - Clare Eckermann (Code, UI design, Voice SFX)
  • Xeethrax (Code, AI & VFX)
  • NKCSS (Code)

Some Ambience sounds by Gamemaster Audio and Imphenzia.com.

Soundtrack "Beauty for Sale" by Streambeats(Harris Heller)
